Indian.title: Butter Chicken (Murgh Makhani)
ingredients: 1.5 lbs boneless chicken breast, cut into 1-inch cubes
1/2 cup raw cashews, soaked and ground
Indian.instructions: Marinate chicken breast cubes in yogurt and tandoori masala for 30 minutes. Heat vegetable oil in a large pan and sauté diced onion, minced garlic, and grated ginger until golden brown. Add tomato paste and cook for 2 minutes until oil separates. Add tomato puree, garam masala, turmeric, and chili powder. Cook for 5 minutes until sauce thickens. Add marinated chicken breast and cook for 8-10 minutes until chicken is fully cooked through. Add heavy cream and ground cashews, simmering for 5 minutes until sauce thickens. Stir in butter and fenugreek leaves. Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve hot with naan bread and basmati rice.

Indian.title: Biryani
ingredients: 1.5 lbs bone-in chicken thighs, cut into pieces
Indian.instructions: Soak basmati rice for 30 minutes. Marinate chicken thighs in yogurt and biryani masala for 1 hour. Heat ghee in a large pot and add whole spices (cardamom, cloves, cinnamon, bay leaf). Add sliced onions and cook until golden. Add minced garlic and grated ginger, cook for 2 minutes. Add marinated chicken and cook for 10 minutes until partially done. Layer half the soaked rice over chicken. Sprinkle mint, cilantro, fried onions, cashews, and raisins. Layer remaining rice. Soak saffron in warm milk and drizzle over rice. Cover tightly and cook on low heat for 25 minutes. Let rest for 10 minutes before serving.

Indian.title: Palak Paneer
Indian.instructions: Blanch spinach leaves in boiling water for 2 minutes, then blend to smooth paste. Heat ghee in a pan and add cumin seeds. Add chopped onions and cook until golden. Add garlic, ginger, and green chilies. Add spices and cook for 1 minute. Add spinach paste and cook for 5 minutes. Add cream, salt, and sugar. Gently add paneer cubes and simmer for 5 minutes. Add lemon juice and garnish with cilantro. Serve hot with naan or rice.

Indian.title: Rogan Josh
ingredients: 2 lbs lamb shoulder, cut into 2-inch pieces
Indian.instructions: Heat ghee in a large pot and add whole spices. Add sliced onions and cook until golden brown. Add garlic and ginger, cook for 2 minutes. Add lamb pieces and brown on all sides. Add yogurt, chili powder, and turmeric. Cook for 5 minutes. Add water, cover, and simmer for 1.5 hours until lamb is tender. Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

Indian.title: Masala Dosa
ingredients: For filling: 4 medium potatoes, boiled and mashed
Indian.instructions: Soak rice and dals separately for 6 hours. Grind to smooth batter and ferment overnight. For filling, heat oil and add mustard and cumin seeds. Add onions and green chilies, cook until soft. Add spices and mashed potatoes. Mix well and set aside. Heat a griddle and pour batter to make thin crepes. Cook until golden, add filling, and fold. Serve hot with coconut chutney and sambar.

Indian.title: Tandoori Chicken
ingredients: Fresh cilantro and lemon wedges for garnish
Indian.instructions: Make deep cuts in chicken pieces. Mix yogurt with all spices, garlic, ginger, lemon juice, and salt. Marinate chicken for at least 4 hours or overnight. Preheat oven to 400°F. Place chicken on a rack and bake for 25-30 minutes, turning once. Brush with oil and broil for 5 minutes until charred. Garnish with cilantro and serve with lemon wedges.

Indian.title: Dal Makhani
Indian.instructions: Soak dals overnight and pressure cook until soft. Heat butter and add cumin seeds. Add onions and cook until golden. Add garlic, ginger, and chilies. Add tomato puree and spices. Add cooked dals and simmer for 30 minutes. Add cream and cook for 10 minutes. Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

Indian.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
Indian.instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tandoori masala for 1 hour. Heat butter and cook onions until golden. Add garlic and ginger. Add tomato puree and spices. Add marinated chicken and cook for 15 minutes. Add cream and simmer for 10 minutes. Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

Indian.title: Aloo Gobi
Indian.instructions: Heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onions and cook until golden. Add garlic, ginger, and chilies. Add spices and cook for 1 minute. Add potatoes and cook for 5 minutes. Add cauliflower and cook for 10-15 minutes until tender. Garnish with cilantro and serve hot.

Indian.title: Gulab Jamun
Indian.instructions: Mix milk powder, flour, and baking soda. Add ghee and enough milk to make soft dough. Make small balls and deep fry until golden brown. For syrup, boil sugar and water with cardamom. Add rose water and saffron. Soak fried balls in warm syrup for 30 minutes. Serve warm or cold.

Indian.title: Chole Bhature
Indian.instructions: Pressure cook chickpeas until soft. Heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onions and cook until golden. Add garlic, ginger, and chilies. Add tomato puree and spices. Add cooked chickpeas and simmer for 20 minutes. For bhature, mix flour with yogurt, salt, and sugar. Knead into soft dough and rest for 2 hours. Roll into circles and deep fry until puffed. Serve hot with chole.

Indian.title: Rajma Masala
Indian.instructions: Pressure cook kidney beans until soft. Heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onions and cook until golden. Add garlic, ginger, and chilies. Add tomato puree and spices. Add cooked beans and simmer for 30 minutes. Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice.

Indian.title: Fish Curry
Indian.instructions: Heat oil and add mustard and cumin seeds. Add onions and cook until golden. Add garlic, ginger, and chilies. Add spices and cook for 1 minute. Add coconut milk and bring to boil. Add fish pieces and cook for 10-15 minutes until done. Add curry leaves and garnish with cilantro. Serve with rice.

Indian.title: Samosa
ingredients: For filling: 3 medium potatoes, boiled and mashed
Indian.instructions: Make dough with flour, oil, and salt. For filling, heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onions and chilies. Add spices and mashed potatoes with peas. Mix well and cool. Roll dough into circles, add filling, and seal into triangles. Deep fry until golden brown. Serve hot with chutney.

Indian.title: Rasgulla
Indian.instructions: Boil milk and add lemon juice to curdle. Strain through muslin cloth and rinse. Knead the paneer until smooth. Make small balls and set aside. Boil sugar and water with cardamom. Add paneer balls and cook for 15 minutes. Add rose water and cool. Serve chilled.

Indian.title: Kadai Paneer
Indian.instructions: Heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onions and cook until golden. Add garlic, ginger, and chilies. Add tomato puree and spices. Add bell peppers and cook for 5 minutes. Add paneer cubes and cook for 5 minutes. Garnish with cilantro and serve hot.

Indian.title: Mutton Curry
Indian.instructions: Heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onions and cook until golden. Add garlic, ginger, and chilies. Add mutton and brown on all sides. Add tomato puree and spices. Cover and cook for 1.5 hours until tender. Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

Indian.title: Malai Kofta
ingredients: For koftas: 3 medium potatoes, boiled and mashed
Indian.instructions: Mix mashed potatoes with paneer, cornflour, and spices. Make balls and deep fry until golden. For gravy, heat oil and cook onions until golden. Add garlic and ginger. Add tomato puree and spices. Add cream and simmer. Add koftas and cook for 5 minutes. Serve hot with naan or rice.

Indian.title: Chicken Biryani
Indian.instructions: Soak rice for 30 minutes. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour. Heat ghee and add whole spices. Add onions and cook until golden. Add garlic and ginger. Add marinated chicken and cook for 10 minutes. Layer half the rice over chicken. Add fried onions, cashews, and raisins. Layer remaining rice. Soak saffron in milk and drizzle over rice. Cover and cook on low heat for 25 minutes. Let rest for 10 minutes before serving.

Indian.title: Aloo Paratha
ingredients: For filling: 3 medium potatoes, boiled and mashed
Indian.instructions: Make dough with flour and salt. For filling, heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onions and chilies. Add spices and mashed potatoes. Mix well and cool. Roll dough into circles, add filling, and seal. Roll again into paratha. Cook on griddle with ghee until golden on both sides. Serve hot with yogurt and pickle.

Indian.title: Kheer
Indian.instructions: Wash and soak rice for 30 minutes. Boil milk in a heavy-bottomed pan. Add rice and cook on low heat for 30 minutes, stirring frequently. Add sugar and cook for 10 minutes. Add nuts, raisins, and cardamom powder. Add rose water and saffron. Cook for 5 minutes. Serve hot or cold.

Indian.title: Quick Dal Tadka
Indian.instructions: Cook lentils in water with turmeric and salt for 15 minutes. Heat ghee and add cumin seeds. Add onion and cook until golden. Add garlic, ginger, and tomatoes. Cook for 3 minutes. Add cooked dal and garam masala. Simmer for 5 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Quick Aloo Gobi
Indian.instructions: Heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onion and cook until golden. Add garlic, ginger, and tomatoes. Cook for 2 minutes. Add potatoes and cauliflower. Add turmeric, garam masala, and salt. Cook for 10 minutes until vegetables are tender. Garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Quick Chicken Curry
Indian.instructions: Heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onion and cook until golden. Add garlic, ginger, and tomatoes. Cook for 3 minutes. Add chicken and cook for 5 minutes. Add spices and salt. Simmer for 8 minutes until chicken is cooked. Garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Quick Jeera Rice
Indian.instructions: Wash and soak rice for 10 minutes. Heat ghee and add whole spices. Add rice and stir for 2 minutes. Add water and salt. Bring to boil, then simmer for 15 minutes. Let rest for 5 minutes. Fluff with fork and garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Quick Raita
Indian.instructions: Whisk yogurt until smooth. Squeeze excess water from cucumber. Mix cucumber, onion, cumin powder, chaat masala, and salt with yogurt. Chill for 10 minutes. Garnish with mint leaves before serving.

Indian.title: Quick Chana Masala
Indian.instructions: Heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onion and cook until golden. Add garlic, ginger, and tomatoes. Cook for 3 minutes. Add chickpeas and spices. Simmer for 8 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Quick Vegetable Biryani
Indian.instructions: Cook rice until 70% done. Heat ghee and cook onion until golden. Add garlic, ginger, and vegetables. Cook for 3 minutes. Add spices and salt. Layer rice over vegetables. Cover and cook for 10 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Quick Samosa
Indian.instructions: Heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onion and cook until golden. Add ginger, potatoes, peas, garam masala, and salt. Cook for 3 minutes. Fill wrappers with mixture and seal. Deep fry until golden. Serve hot with chutney.

Indian.title: Quick Lassi
Indian.instructions: Blend yogurt, milk, sugar, and cardamom powder until smooth. Add ice cubes and blend again. Pour into glasses and garnish with mint leaves. Serve chilled.

Indian.title: Quick Paneer Tikka
Indian.instructions: Mix yogurt with spices and salt. Marinate paneer and vegetables for 10 minutes. Heat oil in pan and cook paneer and vegetables for 5 minutes until golden. Garnish with cilantro and serve hot.

Indian.title: Instant Dal Tadka
Indian.instructions: Boil lentils in water for 8 minutes until soft. Heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onion and garlic, cook for 2 minutes. Add tomatoes and spices, cook for 3 minutes. Add cooked dal and simmer for 2 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Quick Aloo Gobi
Indian.instructions: Heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onion and green chilies, cook for 2 minutes. Add potatoes and cauliflower, cook for 8 minutes. Add spices and salt, cook for 3 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Speedy Chicken Curry
Indian.instructions: Heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onion, garlic, and ginger, cook for 3 minutes. Add chicken and cook for 5 minutes. Add tomato puree and spices, cook for 7 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Quick Jeera Rice
Indian.instructions: Heat ghee and add cumin seeds. Add cooked rice and salt, mix gently for 3 minutes. Garnish with cilantro and serve hot.

Indian.title: Instant Raita
Indian.instructions: Mix yogurt with grated cucumber, cumin powder, and salt. Garnish with mint leaves and red chili powder. Serve chilled.

Indian.title: Quick Chana Masala
Indian.instructions: Heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onion and garlic, cook for 3 minutes. Add tomatoes and spices, cook for 4 minutes. Add chickpeas and cook for 5 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Speedy Egg Curry
Indian.instructions: Heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onion and garlic, cook for 3 minutes. Add tomato puree and spices, cook for 5 minutes. Add halved eggs and cook for 3 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Quick Vegetable Pulao
Indian.instructions: Heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onion and garlic, cook for 2 minutes. Add rice and vegetables, cook for 3 minutes. Add water, spices, and salt. Cook for 12 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Instant Sambar
Indian.instructions: Boil dal and vegetables in water for 10 minutes. Heat oil and add mustard seeds. Add sambar powder and turmeric, cook for 1 minute. Add to dal mixture and simmer for 5 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Quick Fish Curry
Indian.instructions: Heat oil and add onion and garlic, cook for 3 minutes. Add tomatoes and spices, cook for 4 minutes. Add fish and cook for 8 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Speedy Rajma Curry
Indian.instructions: Heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onion and garlic, cook for 3 minutes. Add tomato puree and spices, cook for 4 minutes. Add kidney beans and cook for 5 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Quick Matar Paneer
Indian.instructions: Heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onion and garlic, cook for 3 minutes. Add tomato puree and spices, cook for 4 minutes. Add paneer and peas, cook for 5 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Instant Upma
Indian.instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds. Add onion and green chilies, cook for 2 minutes. Add semolina and cook for 3 minutes. Add water, turmeric, and salt. Cook for 5 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Quick Baingan Bharta
Indian.instructions: Mash roasted eggplant. Heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onion and garlic, cook for 3 minutes. Add tomatoes and spices, cook for 4 minutes. Add mashed eggplant and cook for 5 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Speedy Mutton Curry
Indian.instructions: Heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onion, garlic, and ginger, cook for 3 minutes. Add mutton and cook for 8 minutes. Add tomato puree and spices, cook for 10 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Quick Dal Makhani
Indian.instructions: Boil lentils and beans in water for 15 minutes. Heat butter and add cumin seeds. Add onion and garlic, cook for 3 minutes. Add tomato puree and spices, cook for 4 minutes. Add cooked dal and simmer for 5 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Instant Vegetable Biryani
Indian.instructions: Heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onion and garlic, cook for 2 minutes. Add rice and vegetables, cook for 3 minutes. Add water, spices, and salt. Cook for 15 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Quick Chicken Tikka Masala
Indian.instructions: Heat oil and add cumin seeds. Add onion and garlic, cook for 3 minutes. Add chicken and cook for 5 minutes. Add tomato puree and spices, cook for 7 minutes. Add cream and simmer for 3 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

Indian.title: Speedy Aloo Paratha
Indian.instructions: Make dough with flour and water. Mix mashed potatoes with onion, green chilies, and spices. Roll dough, add filling, and seal. Cook on griddle with oil for 4 minutes per side. Serve hot.
